text:
ACLU | NYC (preferred) or Remote | Full Time

The ACLU is hiring senior backend engineers to work on pivotal projects, leading up to the 2020 presidential election. Now is the time to join the ACLU to inform change, as protecting the civil liberties of American citizens has never been more important than it is now. We will also be adding significantly to our data team (data scientists and analysts) in the coming months. Data roles are limited to NYC. Please email me with a resume for more information ...

Kenn Peters ptec_kp@aclu.org
